sentences.en: A city of southern New Mexico on the Rio Grande north - northwest of El Paso, Texas.
sentences.cn: 拉斯克鲁塞斯新墨西哥南部的一座城市, 位于得克萨斯的埃尔帕索西北偏北格兰德河上.

sentences.en: A shot of Grande Madre di Dio in Torino, Italy.
sentences.cn: 位于都灵, 意大利拍摄的大马德雷迪迪奥.

sentences.en: E se vuoi farti unidea di quanto ｅ grande questo amore.
sentences.cn: 只要我活着,我就把它给你,我再不会给其他人.

sentences.en: E'una grande soddisfazione per me essere in una societ à fantastica come questa.
sentences.cn: 能够加盟这家梦幻般的俱乐部我十分高兴.

sentences.en: Grande Prairie Regional College is a public supported post - secondary institution.
sentences.cn: 格兰伯瑞尔地区学院是一所公立大专以上教育院校.

sentences.en: Grande, which is both Italian and Spanish for large, is medium.
sentences.cn: “豪华”---这个词在意大利语和西班牙语中是大的意思---才是中杯.

sentences.en: Gunmetal sheen of sundown bathes craggy terrain where the Rio Grande cuts a tortuous path.
sentences.cn: 崎岖的山体被蜿蜒的里约格兰地河切断,在夕阳下呈现出暗灰色光泽.

sentences.en: Jacques Grande: I'm going to make you a Quebec Pizza!
sentences.cn: 雅克·甘德: 我正准备给你做一份魁北克比萨呢.

sentences.en: La casa en que vivien ellas ese grande.
sentences.cn: 这家具用木材是很漂亮.

sentences.en: Para m í el deportista m á s grande de todos es Michael Jordan.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他们,但更喜欢迈克尔乔丹.

sentences.en: Part Amistad Reservoir on the Rio Grande in Texas.
sentences.cn: 部分特德水库里奥格兰德在得克萨斯州.

sentences.en: Stroll around Grande Bale, the busiest tourist centre, and you will not be pestered.
sentences.cn: 即使漫步在最热闹的旅游中心格朗第湾, 也不会有人来打扰或纠缠你.

sentences.en: T ú eres mi m á s grande deseo y mi m á s brillante sue? o.
sentences.cn: 你是我最大的愿望和最耀眼的梦想.

sentences.en: The delta region of the Rio Grande river was a forsaken land of thickets and swamps.
sentences.cn: 里奥格兰德河三角洲曾是一片遍布荆棘和沼泽的荒废之地。

sentences.en: The picture shows the Grande Mine.

phrases.tran_cn: 格兰德河（美国和墨西哥之间）
